Build your own simple weather display with NodeJS and Arduino

04 Sep 2014

In this short guide I'll explain how I built my own desktop weather display on an Arduino Uno running Node and Johnny-Five.

You'll need the following things before starting:

  • A 16x2 LCD display, I used the LCD-WH1602B
  • An Arduino board, many will work with this project, but I used an Arduino Uno
  • Different coloured jumper wires
  • A potentiometer
